name: Avestruzii Champion
description: The Avestruzii Champion is well-armored in scale mail and wields a Greataxe, showcasing a powerful physique with a sturdy build reflecting its combat prowess.
memorable: The champion can strike twice with its Greataxe and has the ability to push enemies back, disrupting their formations, making it a strategic threat in combat.
goals: To dominate opponents in battle using brute strength and tactical positioning.
relations: May work alongside other warriors or serve a leader in battle contexts.
environment: Typically found in combat arenas or military encampments.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores provide robust combat capabilities and durability.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity limits its agility in combat, making it less evasive.
attacks: Multiattack with two Greataxe strikes and a Claw attack in close range; also has a ranged option with a Shortbow.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to push a target back after a successful Greataxe hit, allowing it to control the battlefield.
equipment: Equipped with a Greataxe and scale mail for protection.
senses: Passive Perception of 12 indicates average awareness in combat scenarios.
skills: Has average Perception proficiency, reflecting its awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Gains defensive advantages with the 'Dig In' reaction.
Capable of dealing both melee and ranged damage.
Effective in team combat scenarios due to its strong attack options.
